Params: {1: 'The fate between the hero and Demon Lord was predetermined from the start.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1'}

{1: 'As the hero\'s first battle after leaving the village, the Demon Lord is meant to be nothing more than an experience farm, not even worthy of being called an "obstacle."', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1', 9: '1'}
{3: "Embraced by the softness of the feather bed, the hero drifts into deep slumber while the system in their mind tirelessly reviews the script's progression:"}
{2: 'System', 3: "Hero, storms the Demon Lord's castle, ends up imprisoned.", 18: '100009295'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'To kill the Demon Lord, first gain affection, and trust.', 18: '100009296'}

{3: "—Indeed, the hero isn't born invincible. At their first destination after leaving the village, armed with only a sword, the hero truly suffered defeat at the Demon Lord's hands and was imprisoned in the garden of thorns."}
{3: "Though the hero's gift may allow them to dispel all dark curses, their fragile human body remains no match for the sharp-thorned brambles and towering castle walls."}
{3: 'In this dire situation, conventional tactics would no longer suffice to defeat the Demon Lord, so the hero quickly devised a new approach.'}
{2: 'Wait... That narration was a bit too rushed...', 3: '33'}
{3: '—As the script dictates, the hero observes carefully and discovers a curse that can restrain the Demon Lord.'}
{2: 'A "curse"? There\'s a curse that can restrain the Demon Lord?', 3: '37', 4: 'Is it important? Why is it suddenly in bold?', 5: '37'}
{3: "—After gaining the Demon Lord's trust, the hero boldly summoned the curse during a grand castle ball, causing it to devour the Demon Lord."}
{3: '—The story concludes with a finale of fighting fire with fire, bringing great satisfaction to all.'}
{2: '——Satisfaction my foot! Explain to me what this curse is first!', 3: '42', 4: 'What kind of garbage narration is this?', 5: '42', 6: '...Achoo—!', 7: '42'}
{3: 'The hero nearly shouts out in their sleep, then immediately hears the crisp sound of birdsong.'}
{3: 'The hero awakens from deep slumber as the soft morning light and delicate first snowflakes filter through the window together.'}
{2: "Why isn't the window closed?", 3: '57', 4: "It's so cold...", 5: '57'}
{3: 'A system prompt appears perfectly timed before their eyes.'}
{1: '11', 2: "<color=#ffffffff><size=28>Main Mission Objective Updated: Continue to Raise [Demon Lord Vera]'s Affection</size></color>", 3: '600', 4: '175', 9: '3', 10: '1'}

{3: "Main Mission Objective Updated: Continue to Raise [Demon Lord Vera]'s Affection\\nProgress: [Accepted]\\nDemon Lord Affection: -10\\nFinal Objective: Demon Lord Affection 100\\nCountdown: 40 Hours"}
{3: 'Staring at the affection value on the system interface—a number far from the target goal—you frantically search your memory for any relevant knowledge on the subject.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'I want to see our hero first thing when I wake up tomorrow.', 4: '1', 18: '100009297'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I won't be pleased if all you're going to do is run your mouth.", 4: '1', 18: '100009298'}
{1: 'The first rays of dawn have just begun to peek over the horizon.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1'}
{1: "There's still some time before Vera sees you.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1'}

{1: 'Before then, according to common relationship-building strategies from various scripts and games,', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1'}
{1: 'You should first prepare a suitable gift for her.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1'}
{1: 'But as a confined "prisoner," how could you possibly prepare anything?', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1', 9: '1'}
{2: 'Not to mention the gift-giving button has been disabled by this deranged system...', 3: '98'}
{3: 'Your eyes sweep across the sparse furnishings of the room, then drift toward the window. Outside, a garden of brilliant red roses blooms, strikingly vivid against the falling snow.'}
{2: 'What about flowers?', 3: '103', 4: 'Would Vera like roses?', 5: '103', 6: 'Would the Demon Lord like roses?', 7: '103'}
{3: 'Muffled arguments from outside the door interrupt your planning.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Technor', 3: 'You idiot! Are you trying to weasel out of this small task?! You\'re always calling me "bro," but the moment something needs doing, you turn into a complete coward!', 4: '1', 18: '100009299'}
{2: 'Technor', 3: "The decision's final. I'll guard the suspicious human in the attic, and you'll clean up the rose garden.", 4: '1', 18: '100009300'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Howitzer', 3: 'I-I have to w-work in the g-garden... while b-bro just... s-sits here...', 4: '2', 18: '100009301'}
{2: 'Technor', 3: "How dare you talk back to me? I'll show you just how fearsome your bro can be!", 4: '1', 18: '100009302'}
{3: 'The two guards—one who was doing the hitting and one who was taking the beating—stop their scuffle. Upon seeing the hero, they immediately draw their weapons with wary expressions.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Technor', 3: "By the Demon Lord's order, you are forbidden to leave this room even a single step!", 4: '1', 18: '100009304'}
{2: "Don't get me wrong. I'm just trying to help.", 3: '143'}
{2: "Didn't you just mention something about cleaning the rose garden?", 3: '145'}
{2: "If it's just regular gardening work, I can help out.", 3: '146'}
{2: 'Howitzer', 3: 'N-no way. What if y-you try to e-escape... R-right, b-bro?', 4: '2', 18: '100009306'}
{3: 'Techno steps closer, pointing his weapon menacingly.'}
{2: 'Technor', 3: "I'm warning you, don't try to escape.", 4: '1', 18: '100009307'}
{2: "I won't run, but if the Demon Lord gets upset about it, that's not my problem.", 3: '153'}
{2: 'Technor', 3: '...What could she possibly blame us for?', 4: '1', 18: '100009308'}
{2: 'Let me count your sins in detail...', 3: '155'}
{2: '—You! First sin! Willfully spreading false rumors!', 3: '156'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The hero suddenly points a finger at the stuttering guard, Howitzer.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Howitzer', 3: "I'm c-completely loyal to my l-lord! I never s-spread any rumors!", 4: '2', 18: '100009309'}
{2: "It must be because of your unclear speech that people misunderstood and thought the Demon Lord couldn't be looked at directly!", 3: '163'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Howitzer anxiously looks toward his colleague for help, while the hero suddenly whips around to point at Technor.'}
{2: 'Stubborn and self-righteous, making arbitrary assumptions, ineffective in your duties, and repeating the same mistakes!', 3: '172'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Technor', 3: 'Huh?! What assumptions have I made? And what exactly did I do wrong?', 4: '1', 18: '100009312'}
{2: '(Such stereotypical and stupid NPCs...)', 3: '175', 4: '(I must put this to good use...)', 5: '175'}
{3: "The hero suddenly backs away several steps, then leaps onto the wide-open window. Snowflakes swirl in with the cold wind, causing the hero's body to sway precariously."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Technor', 3: 'Hey! Get down from there! What are you doing?!', 4: '1', 18: '100009313'}
{2: "You couldn't stand that the Demon Lord placed me in the tower room, so you left the window open all night.", 3: '191'}
{2: 'You wanted me to freeze to death?', 3: '192'}
{2: 'Whatever your intentions, you still did wrong.', 3: '196'}
{2: 'The Demon Lord wants to see me right away, and if I were to jump down now...', 3: '197'}
{2: 'Do you think the Demon Lord would blame you for that?', 3: '198'}
{3: 'The hero clings to the window ledge, waving politely.'}
{3: 'The hero spreads their arms wide and falls backward from the window.'}
{3: 'Now, three suspicious figures creep stealthily through the castle corridor.', 5: '18'}
{3: 'The oppressive atmosphere stems not only from the dim building itself, but also from the vigilant eyes watching closely from both sides.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Technor', 3: "...Fine, we'll do it your way for now, but you must not let the Demon Lord find out! Otherwise we're all done for!", 4: '1', 18: '100009317'}
{2: 'No problem. Besides, you have no choice but to do as I say,', 3: '230'}
{2: "If you don't, I've got a hundred ways to make sure your Demon Lord never sees me.", 3: '231'}
{3: 'Even after temporarily "winning" this round, the feeling of being escorted as a captive remains uncomfortable.'}
{1: 'Fortunately... the garden that appears before you softens the atmosphere just in time.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: "The castle in the morning light bears no trace of yesterday's gloomy first impression. Remarkably, red roses bloom in full glory beneath the falling snow.", 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: 'The hero gently brushes snow from the petals, trims away withered leaves, and carefully cups the frozen flowers in their hands.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: 'After some time, the flower in hand regains its vitality under the nurturing warmth, and the hero plucks it from the bush.', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Technor', 3: 'Stop this pointless nonsense and hurry up. Tear out all these roses and trample them—not a single one should remain. Like this, understand?', 4: '1', 18: '100009319'}
{3: 'As the guards speak, they violently tear roses from the garden beds and crush them underfoot.'}
{3: "The once-blooming rose garden transforms into ruins within moments under the guards' violent rampage."}
{2: "Huh? Aren't we supposed to be pruning them?", 3: '262', 4: '...So this is what "cleaning up" means?', 5: '262'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Technor', 3: "Stop asking so many questions and watch your mouth! If you don't hurry up and work, she'll take your head right off!", 4: '1', 18: '100009320'}
{1: "After a moment's thought, the hero carefully tucks the rose inside their clothing.", 3: '50'}
{3: "After a moment's thought, the hero carefully tucks the rose inside their clothing."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Howitzer', 3: 'H-hey, are you trying to get yourself killed? If you keep that flower... the D-Demon Lord will be fur—mmph!', 4: '2', 18: '100009321'}
{2: 'Technor', 3: "Shh! Hurry up and finish the work, then take the human to the Demon Lord. Don't say anything else.", 4: '1', 18: '100009322'}
{2: 'Technor', 3: "If the human wants to die so badly, that's not our problem.", 4: '1', 18: '100009323'}
{2: 'Is there something wrong... with the roses?', 3: '275'}
{3: "From the guards' scattered remarks, the hero gazes at the ruined rose garden as a faint suspicion begins to form."}
{3: "Before you could inquire further, the guards' faces display that familiar look of panic as they bow toward someone behind you."}
{3: 'Without turning around, you know that their "Demon Lord" now stands right behind them.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Turning around, you are met with Vera's cold, expressionless face."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You seem eager to find out what punishment awaits those who break the rules.', 4: '1', 18: '100009325'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Remember what I said—the prisoner is not to take a single step outside that room without my orders.', 4: '1', 18: '100009326'}
{2: "—I've prepared a gift for you, Demon Lord.", 3: '296'}
{3: "Upon hearing the hero's words, the Demon Lord raises an eyebrow with slight interest."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What little trick are you trying to pull now?', 4: '1', 18: '100009327'}
{3: "But the moment she sees the rose, the Demon Lord's expression darkens once more."}
{3: 'She closes in instantly, and before you can make out what she is doing, a cold, hard object presses against your neck.'}
{3: 'Without looking, you know it is a sharp dagger—the blade slowly glides across your skin, bringing a faint sensation of pain.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You dare to give me something like this... Was it truly unintentional?', 4: '1', 18: '100009329'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Did my subordinates not tell you what "roses" mean to me?', 4: '1', 18: '100009330'}
{3: "She whispers into the hero's ear while slowly crushing the rose beneath her toe."}
{3: 'In yesterday\'s prison, the "Demon Lord" who looked exactly like Vera seemed to have whispered something, but there was no time to make it out then.'}
{2: "The rose... it's the same as your hair.", 3: '323'}
{3: 'The hero maintains their tense posture, lifting the rose slightly higher—just like that time beneath the ruins, when they, burning with fever, clutched a handful of fiery red hair.'}
{3: "The Demon Lord's expression freezes for a moment."}
{3: 'After a moment of silence, the cold, imposing pressure against your neck eases—she lowers her blade.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "...You're still too confident about your situation. Next time, you won't be so lucky.", 4: '1', 18: '100009332'}
{3: "The blade barely grazes the human's hand—snip! Vera cuts the rose from the hero's grasp, pinching it delicately between her fingertips."}
{1: '1', 3: 'She gently brushes the flower against her cheek, seemingly contemplating how to deal with the person before her.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Get back to your cell. I don't want to see you again.", 4: '1', 18: '100009333'}
{3: 'After tossing out that cold command, she dismisses the entire charade and walks away.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Technor', 3: 'Do not address my lord by name!', 4: '18', 18: '100009334'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As the hero attempts to follow, guards block the way with their weapons while the system issues another warning their mind.'}
{3: "Vera ignores the hero's call completely, her fiery red silhouette quickly vanishing into the snowy landscape."}
{3: 'What seemed like a failed attempt suddenly gives way to contemplation as a system notification appears.'}
{1: '11', 2: "<color=#ffffffff><size=28>Main Mission Objective Updated: Continue to Raise [Demon Lord Vera]'s Affection</size></color>", 3: '600', 4: '175', 9: '3', 10: '1'}

{3: "Main Mission Objective Updated: Continue to Raise [Demon Lord Vera]'s Affection\\nProgress: [Accepted]\\nDemon Lord Affection: 20\\nFinal Objective: Demon Lord Affection 100\\nCountdown: 39 Hours"}
{3: 'The negative "Affection" value flickers several times before slowly climbing to 20.'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Droplets of melted snow still cling to the rose petals,', 3: '0', 4: '100', 6: '1', 9: '3'}
{1: '3', 2: 'Her fingers gently brush over the petals, savoring their soft, moist texture.', 3: '0', 4: '0', 6: '1', 9: '3'}
{1: '4', 2: 'How long has it been since she last stepped into that garden of blooming roses?', 3: '-550', 4: '200', 6: '1', 9: '3'}
{1: '5', 2: 'She cannot remember ▆▆▆▆▆. All she knows is that ▆▆ despises these blooming red flowers.', 3: '0', 4: '100', 6: '1', 9: '3'}
{1: '2', 2: 'No matter how many times she orders them cut down, those flowers continue to defy her will.', 3: '0', 4: '100', 6: '1', 9: '3'}
{1: '3', 2: 'They always grow and bloom again, emitting their nauseating fragrance day and night.', 3: '0', 4: '0', 6: '1', 9: '3'}
{1: '5', 2: 'Foolishly handed her poison, thinking it was a delightful gift.', 3: '0', 4: '-200', 6: '1', 9: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The Demon Lord looks at the rose in her hand—then shifts her gaze to another "glass case" before her.'}
{3: 'Within a transparent dark magic barrier, a blood-red rose reflects the faint glow of moonlight.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'This is the very rose that bears her fate, marking the countdown for both herself and this castle—that detestable "rose."', 4: '2'}
{2: '13', 3: 'Just sitting there, emitting that nauseating fragrance—are you mocking me, you deranged system?', 4: '1', 18: '100009337'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "...Ugh! What's wrong, afraid I won't follow your script?", 4: '1', 18: '100009338'}
{3: 'As if something has pierced her M.I.N.D., the Demon Lord tightly clutches the rose in her hand and turns to thrust open the window.'}
{3: 'She stretches out her hand, ready to cast the rose into the howling snowstorm.'}
{3: 'The fierce blizzard whips her crimson hair into the air, its brilliant red strands flowing indistinguishably from the rose petals in her hand.'}
{3: 'Even with a dagger pressed against their throat, that person would still utter those words, as if purely wanting to offer a flower.'}
{3: '—Yet the probing gleam in their eyes was impossible to ignore.'}
{1: '1', 2: '501216', 3: 'My little commandant is trying so hard... Ugh!', 4: '1', 18: '100009339'}
{3: "She challenges the system's punishment again and again. As pain surges through her M.I.N.D., the hero's words play on repeat."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'If I keep just this one flower, will it bring the curse one step closer, System?', 4: '1', 18: '100009341'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "It doesn't matter. Seems you don't even know your own doom approaches.", 4: '1', 18: '100009342'}
{3: 'The Demon Lord suddenly withdraws her hand, turns to face the mirror, and pins the rose given by the hero into her hair.'}
{1: '1', 3: "The vibrant rose blooms amid her red hair, just as the hero said—the petals' hue perfectly complementing her crimson locks.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '501216', 3: 'Very well... A Demon Lord should indeed keep company with cursed objects.', 4: '1', 18: '100009343'}

{1: 'And withering alongside it is <color=#Ff4e4eff>"that rose"</color> under the glass dome—it too silently sheds a petal.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1'}

{1: '<color=#Ff4e4eff>That rose</color> has but a few petals left on its stem, with layers of fallen ones piled beneath.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1', 9: '1'}
{1: '2', 2: '<color=#000000ff><size=80>you and everything in this castle will face</size></color><color=#ff4e4eff><size=80> annihilation.</size></color>', 4: '0', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '3'}
{3: 'When the last petal falls,you and everything in this castle will face annihilation.'}
{3: 'She raises her fist and smashes it against the glass dome once more—a gesture she has made countless times since becoming the "Demon Lord."'}
{3: 'The glass dome housing the rose remains completely intact, but the small table beside it has been smashed into pieces under her powerful blow.'}
{3: 'She slowly slides her fingertips across her lips, coating them with blood. Soon, she tastes the warm, sweet metallic flavor.'}
{3: 'Then, she presses her fingers together and lets out a whistle.'}
{3: 'The far-reaching whistle pierces through the winter night and falling snow, reaching the ears of that person in the dungeon.'}
{3: 'A seemingly meaningless whistle has been sent out, but the system shows no reaction.'}
{3: 'The Demon Lord smiles as she looks into the mirror—invisible shadows slowly creep toward her.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "When the time comes, I'll properly face that curse.", 4: '1', 18: '100009348'}
